headerPrara: Customized MPQR and mVISA portals for Banks
productOverview1Para: It is one of the payment methods automatically available for all OME Customers. You can pay with scanner on our pass through mobile app and other enabled Bank mobile apps.
productOverview2Para: Choose bank transfer with QR code. Scan and initiate payment or transfer from our mobile app menu. You can also use demo mode to test QR payment.
